content: All American workers understand the life and job responsibilities of over the road trailer truck drivers. I had 35 years experience with truck drivers and studied the FROZEN truck driver case. I studied the legal case and read the Gorsuch dissent. As far as I could tell there was no just or legal reason for the dissent. Thus I question Judge Gorsuch judgment and understanding of the law.I would cast him for a movie about the supreme court but I do not trust him for a lifetime appointment.
